item.title: Elixir Programming Language
item.description: Elixir is a dynamically-typed functional programming language. Intractive elixir environment $ iex Hello World! intro.exs #!/bin/elixir IO.puts("Hello" <> " Elixir!!") Build Tool mix help mix new mix compile mix test mix run Create mix new example
